review:
Problems I was facing since one year came to an end after visiting Dr Ashok K Raj…He diagnosed my problem after seeing the synopsis which I prepared for him..within two days of the treatment ,I was showing signs of improvement….now I’m feeling much better and I’m happily doing oral advertisement of Dr Ashok K Raj to the patients suffering from pulmonary diseases…Thank you Doctor for your excellent diagnosis & treatment 
Regards 
Nishi Saraswat

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My 21yr old daughter had TB, which got diagnosed very late due to Kalra hosp. I then came to know about Dr. Rajput and treatment started in Jun 20. Her left lung was completely devastated and right lung was also infected. Now, the disease is under control and left lung is functioning 65%. Most doctors had said that we might have to sacrifice this lung but thanks to Dr. Rajput my daughter is fine. God bless Dr. Rajput.

I 100% recommend him

review: Consulted doctor for coronavirus symptoms before getting a positive report. His line of treatment was focussed and helped me to recover timely. He listened to the problems and provided the right prescription and diet suggestions for relieving the symptoms.

review:
We had a very comfortable and smooth experience. Dr. Ashok K Rajput has been very kind, pleasant and patient and highly professional *** ************* ******* 
Would highly recommend doctor Ashok to your friends & family guys!!
****** **** * he understood our issue and gave us proper explanation for the cause of issue , but a bit lesh friendly
Doctor didn't even do the physical examination of patient  on its own. After asking he checked the BP.
reply_text: BP was checked and was normal. Every patient doesn't need measuring BP. She came for respiratory consult, not for general physical examination. Whatever is essential is heard, checked and seen. Crux is to reach diagnosis with least interaction in Covid times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Don't give time always remains in hurry.I took 4 consultation from him. He never remember the previous treatment or problem for which patient took the consultation.Indeed very expensive and worthy.
reply_text: Patients are supposed to bring old prescription. If you visit after a long interval and that too with a mask in covid times, no one can remember. Doctor recalls details only on seeing past prescriptions.

review: My father was having persistent cough for more than 10 days and he took some local doctor’s treatment. He did not get relief from that. Then we consulted Dr. Ashok Rajput. He enquired about the health problems and then gave few medicines for 1 week. My father got relief after 3 days of medication. I would like to thank doctor for the same and highly recommend him.
